sentence.Network_en: A chastened Agassi flew home for a period of deep contemplation.
sentence.Network_cn: 追悔莫及的阿加西坐飞机回家面壁思过去了。

sentence.Network_en: He roused himself from his lazy contemplation of the scene beneath him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不再懒洋洋地注视着下面的景色。

sentence.Network_en: He was lost in the contemplation of the landscape.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对着眼前的景色沉思起来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from Latin contemplatio(n-), from the verb contemplari (see contemplate)

entry.def: If you contemplate an action, you think about whether to do it or not.

example.ex: For a time he contemplated a career as an army medical doctor...
example.tran: 有段时间，他考虑去当军医。

example.ex: She contemplates leaving for the sake of the kids.
example.tran: 她考虑为了孩子而离开。

entry.tran: 深思熟虑;沉思;苦思冥想
entry.def: If you contemplate an idea or subject, you think about it carefully for a long time.

example.ex: As he lay in his hospital bed that night, he cried as he contemplated his future...
example.tran: 那天晚上，他躺在医院的病床上，想到未来，他哭了起来。

example.ex: That makes it difficult to contemplate the idea that the present policy may not be sustainable.
example.tran: 那让人难以认真思考这个可能，即目前的政策也许并不能持续下去。

entry.def: If you contemplate something or someone, you look at them for a long time.

example.ex: He contemplated his hands, still frowning.
example.tran: 他盯着自己的双手，眉头紧锁。

auth_sentence.content: Each absorbed in contemplation of his own thoughts.

auth_sentence.content: I sat down...and gave myself up to contemplation.
auth_sentence.res_content: I sat down...and gave myself up to contemplation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I sat down...and gave myself up to contemplation.

auth_sentence.res_content: The contemplation of the...stars...stimulated him to contempt of all mutable things.

sentences.en: She was lost in contemplation of the scene in front of her.
sentences.cn: 她给眼前的这一幕深深地吸引住了。

sentences.en: She spent an hour in quiet contemplation.
sentences.cn: 她静静地沉思了一个小时。

sentences.en: He spent many hours in deep contemplation.
sentences.cn: 他花了多个小时专心思考。

sentences.en: He reached his decision after a good deal of contemplation.
sentences.cn: 他经过周密思考后作出了决定。

sentences.en: She bought three dresses in contemplation of her trip.
sentences.cn: 她为了作一次旅行买了三套衣服。
